Preconditions: User is logged into the chat application

Test Case ID: 2. Navigate to the group chat section.
3. Select a group chat from the list.
4. Verify that the selected group chat opens successfully.
Test Case Name: The selected group chat is displayed with the correct messages and participants.

Preconditions: User is in a group chat

Test Case ID: 2. Click on the group info icon.

Test Case Name: The list of participants matches the expected members of the group chat.

Preconditions: User is in a group chat

Test Case ID: 2. Type a message in the message input box.

Test Case Name: The message appears in the group chat for all participants to see.

Preconditions: User is in a group chat

Test Case ID: 2. Click on the group info icon.
3. Select the option to leave the group chat.
Test Case Name: User is removed from the group chat and no longer sees it in their chat list.
